# LARs using iris dataset

## Libraries and packages
```{r}
#install.packages("lars")
library(lars)
data(iris)

```

## Assigning values
```{r}
y <- iris$Sepal.Length

x <- as.matrix(iris[, c("Sepal.Width", "Petal.Length", "Petal.Width")])

dim(x)
head(x)
```
#LARS
```{r}
lars_model <- lars(x, y, type = "lar")
lars_model

#plot
plot(lars_model)
legend("topleft", legend = colnames(x), col = 1:3, lty = 1)
```
## Choosing the best model
```{r}
set.seed(123)

cv_model <- cv.lars(x, y, type = "lar")

plot(cv_model$index, cv_model$cv, type = "b",
     xlab = "Fraction of L1 norm",
     ylab = "Cross Validation Error",
     main = "Cross Validation for LARS")

```
